title: Calories in 1 Ounce of Vodka
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 ounce of vodka, including alcohol content, zero carbs or fats, and nutrition breakdowns for standard 80-proof varieties.
assumptions: Standard 80-proof (40% ABV) unflavored vodka; 1 fluid ounce â‰ˆ 30 ml serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, proof, flavoring, and serving size. Alcohol content affects calorie density. Consult labels for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 1 ounce of 80-proof vodka provides ~64 kcal from alcohol, with no carbs, protein, or fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison; alcohol contributes 7 kcal per gram.

faqs.q: How many calories in a shot of vodka?
faqs.a: A standard 1-ounce shot of 80-proof vodka has about 64 calories.

faqs.q: Does vodka have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Plain vodka has 0 g carbs and 0 g sugars; calories come solely from alcohol.
Proof strength and flavorings; higher proof increases calories, flavored adds sugars.

faqs.q: Calories in vodka vs. other spirits?
faqs.a: Similar to gin or rum at ~64 kcal per ounce for 80-proof; varies by type.
Yes, unflavored vodka is low-carb (0 g) and fits keto diets in moderation.
